commit.message:
Auto merge of #53057 - nrc:update, r=kennytm

Update rustfmt, RLS, Clippy

r? @kennytm

Fixes RLS build and updates RLS and Rustfmt to their 1.0 RCs

files.patch:
@@ -1770,7 +1770,7 @@ dependencies = [
 
 [[package]]
 name = "rls"
-version = "0.129.0"
+version = "0.130.2"
 dependencies = [
  "cargo 0.30.0",
